conbody.p: Geo IP processoroverviewprocessorsGeo IPGeo IP processorsupported databasesThe Geo IP processor provides geographic location information for IP addresses.
The Geo IP processor can use the MaxMind GeoIP2 City or the GeoIP2 Country database file to provide geolocation information. You must provide your own copy of the database file.
conbody.note: MaxMind provides free versions of the GeoIP2 databases that you can use.
conbody.p: To use the Geo IP processor, you specify the location of the database file and the database type. You enter one or more IP address input fields, name the corresponding output field, and specify the geolocation information that you want.
The input field must be an Integer or String datatype with IP addresses formatted as follows: n.n.n.n.

Geo IP can provide the following geolocation information for each IP address:
Country name
Country ISO code
City name
Latitude
Longitude
